sections.title: BongaCams Launch Steps
bullets: Request regional boosts via Telegram rep before first show
Enable multi-language bio blocks with ES + PT snippets
Set minimum private price equal to 1.8x public tip goal

sections.title: BongaCams Routines
bullets: Host a short daytime show for EU commuters twice per week
Enter Daily Top contests with themed wardrobe shots
Send follow-up DMs to new fans within 12 hours
